posts.post_content:
I am interested in the following T206's.  Let me know if you have any available.  You can email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url] Thanks, Bill

Wilhelm (Hands at Chest): Sovereign 150, Sovereign 350, EPDG

Fiene (Throwing): AB 350 Frame, Cycle 350, EPDG, Hindu, Old Mill, PB, Tolstoi

Graham (St. Louis): Sweet Caporal 350, Carolina Brights, Old Mill

Bradley (With Bat): AB 350 No Frame, AB 460, Cycle 460, SC 350-460, EPDG, Old Mill, PB, Tolstoi

Conroy (With Bat): Sovereign 350, AB 460, Cycle 460, SC 350-460, EPDG, Old Mill, PB, Tolstoi

Lake (St. Louis, No Ball): Cycle 460, SC 350-460, EPDG, Tolstoi

Wagner (Bat on Right Shoulder): AB 350 No Frame, Sovereign 350, AB 460, Cycle 460, SC 350-460, EPDG, Old Mill, PB

Ball (Cleveland): AB 460, Cycle 460, SC 350-460, Old Mill, PB, Tolstoi

$99 delivered, including insurance and delivery confirmation.  PayPal OK
